storyInfo:
Pancho, the true mastermind, takes over the ship and announces his intention to take over the city.
On the beach, Hoshiguma and the gang find a group attempting to assassinate the mayor. So they immediately rush to her aid.

attributes.content: Huh? What's wrong? I can't connect to the program's internal feed.
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: It's... being hijacked?
attributes.name: Staff Worker

attributes.content: Ten years ago, I thought Bolívar would find true peace if we chased the Coalition and the Singas out of the country.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: I risked my life to fight for True Bolívarians.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: In the end, three thousand of my brothers fought to their deaths. If it wasn't for my own brother risking his life to save mine, I would've been shot that day.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: And that was the day when I finally realized.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: The Coalition, the Singas dynasty's nobles, and True Bolívarians. Not one of them truly wants to save Bolívar. All they are doing is fighting a war.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: And no matter how long this war lasts, Bolívar will never see salvation.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: To escape the turmoil, I made my way to this city.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: In a hopeless country, I found this hopeless city.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: And then we have Candela Sanchez, who's the most hopeless of us all.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: On this hopeless swath of land, she built a city far more corrupt than all Bolívarian cities combined.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: And not only is she enjoying this herself, she is even dragging all those around her into her cesspit of enjoyment.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: All of them think they lead a proper life.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: They have no idea just how much blood lies underneath them, in the city's sewers and how many scavenging beasts the place is feeding.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: She is feeding on the flesh and blood of all those who live in these lands, never to care about their lives.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: This city must die, and all of you who indulge in the pleasures this place has to offer must die with it!
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: The championship's over.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Now, I will take back this city.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: If no one else will save this country, I will.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: So your father is the one behind all this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: When you realized we were starting to piece it all together, you chose to divert our attention toward you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That way, even if we actually figured it out, you would get to buy time for the one pulling the strings.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's right. I'm not going to say I won, Miss Ch'en. This was never a fair fight to begin with.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You came too late, and you took on Ms. Candela's mission too hastily.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This is the final bit of generosity I have to offer, Miss Ch'en. Surrender, along with Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: If you give up without a fight, I can guarantee that no one will lay a finger on you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You have nothing to do with this. There is no reason for you to jump into our morally gray mess.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I can't do that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This ship has been taken over by our men. If you resist, you and Miss Lin will die.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: An old friend once told me, I have to take a beating before I can learn, like a young her, that being a stubborn ass is just a stupid impulse.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And even now, I've got no idea what kind of stubbornness I'm supposed to stick to and what counts as an unrealistic, stupid impulse.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But my guess is she probably knows that's not enough to stop me, or my name isn't Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do what you're gonna do. I'm in a hurry.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, isn't that Mr. Pancho? What is he talking about?
attributes.name: Startled Male Tourist

attributes.content: I don't know. Is this some kind of special performance?
attributes.name: Startled Female Tourist

attributes.content: Was that an explosion?! Where was it?!
attributes.name: Terrified Male Tourist

attributes.content: I think it came from the place where the first round took place! Look, there's smoke in that direction!
attributes.name: Terrified Female Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey! You're kidding! Is old man Pancho serious?!
attributes.name: Terrified Male Tourist

attributes.content: Lady Candela, there are numerous unknown forces sowing chaos in the city and the surrounding countryside.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Tsk tsk... So that's your move, Pancho?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Lady Candela, please, we need to move you somewhere safe.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Evacuate? Don't be absurd. I have the front row seat here. I'm not going anywhere.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Don't worry about the ruffians on the streets; deal with them as you see fit. My guess is that I am their ultimate objective anyway.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Oh, don't forget to clear the crowds too. Be sure to close the city's gates first, though. Send everyone home.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: After that, secure the staff.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: However.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Make sure they make preparations for the banquet, and definitely make sure the championship's live broadcast goes uninterrupted.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Protect them, but don't ruin my championship. Is that understood?
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Right, and get me some new drones. They probably wrecked all the ones on the ship. We mustn't miss out on all this fun.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Hey, you're kidding. We're here on holiday. How did this happen?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Though I guess this is what Bolívar is supposed to feel like.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Enough. Let's figure out what to do with this.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Missy, we're tourists. This is nothing we should poke our heads into.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Would you say that to Ch'en Hui-chieh if she was standing right here?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Of course, but I'm sure you know what she'd say.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Then my answer's the same.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Alright. All I'll say is I'm not against this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Rhodes Island... Ugh, Sideroca's getting drinks. Let me go check on her.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And, besides, the two of them are on the ship too. How am I not supposed to worry?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm not all that worried about them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's more, we are outsiders. It's not like we've got a side here. Though with all this ruckus going on, I very much doubt Ch'en and Lin are oblivious.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't know what's going on on the ship, and it's not very realistic for us to get on board to help them, so let's stick to the things we know we can do.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Tsk, how dare you ambush me while I have drinks in my hands.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: (I didn't expect to see something like this happen here.)
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: (Looks like they are organized. The beach has fallen into chaos.)
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: (I don't have a weapon on me either, so it's hard for me to do anything. Maybe I should regroup with Hoshiguma first...)
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Let's get her.
attributes.name: Tourist A?

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Tourist B?

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Sideroca!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Thanks, Hoshiguma!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: No need to thank me. That reminds me, you're like the captain of this mission. You heard that just now, didn't you? What will Rhodes Island do about this?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm on vacation myself. Just a passerby helping with what she can won't be a problem, right?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Ha, I knew you would say that. Let's go, then.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Red, where are you?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: No idea, Sideroca. Lots of people. Stench of blood.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. Come to the beach.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I need you to protect Eyjafjalla and Sussurro.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: There's a group over there. They aren't running...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Are they heading toward... the mayor?!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Come, Sideroca, let's stop them!
attributes.name: Hoshiguma
